Class NBodyRegularBenchmark

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.benchmark.NBodyRegularBenchmark
public class NBodyRegularBenchmark extends Object
N-body gravitational simulation benchmark - NAIVE OPTIMIZED IMPLEMENTATION.

Uses primitive arrays for maximum performance. Serves as baseline comparison for the JScience API-based implementation.

Tests performance of direct N-body gravitational simulation with O(NÃ‚Â²) force calculations.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
